title.zh: 线上：世界血友病联盟官网发布中国故事
title.en: Online: World Federation of Hemophilia Official Website Publishes Chinese Story

subtitle.zh: 为中国女性血友病发声：我的和她们的故事
subtitle.en: Speaking for Chinese Women with Hemophilia: My Story and Theirs

description.zh: 玉洁撰写的中国女性血友病故事「为中国女性血友病发声：我的和她们的故事」成功通过审核被接收，登上世界血友病联盟（WFH）官网故事板块（WHD Stories）。作为今年2025的WHD stories里首个中国故事，我们成功让世界听到了中国女性的呐喊，在国际平台上为中国血友病女性群体发出了强有力的声音。
description.en: The Chinese women's hemophilia story 'Speaking for Chinese Women with Hemophilia: My Story and Theirs' written by Yujie (Ruby) was successfully reviewed and accepted, appearing on the World Federation of Hemophilia (WFH) official website story section (WHD Stories). As the first Chinese story in the 2025 WHD stories, we successfully let the world hear the cry of Chinese women, making a powerful voice for Chinese female hemophilia groups on the international platform.

title.zh: WFH官网：中国女性血友病故事
title.en: WFH Official: Chinese Women's Hemophilia Story

title.zh: 微信公众号：WFH官网故事发布报道
title.en: WeChat: WFH Official Story Publication Report
